Description: Marks of Fortune Currency Pack

Marks of Fortune Currency Pack
"Don the mantle of the mighty cave bear."
"Mischief follows the fox."
"There are horns for drinking and horns for wearing. One needs both."
“Crafted from the infernal union of human and demon.”
"Strike foes down with divine vengeance."
“Cast out evil with fury and righteous light.”
"A scream in the witching hour."
"Their howl grows ever closer."
"The serpents of yore slither eternally with scales of steel."
"With a bite as fearsome as the world serpent's."
"A fitting tribute to the beast of slaughter."
“Leave cursed retribution in your wake.”
“A lance blessed to maintain the balance of light and darkness.”
“Tormented hellfire crackles within.”
“A staff imbued with restorative primordial forces.”
"Brimming with awe, the vast expanse of the universe resides within the fur of this rabbit. And if you pet them, you might just feel it too."
"Treacherous waters can yield great treasure."
"Approval, disapproval, withholding judgment."   Includes three separate emotes, thumbs up, down, and sideways.
"Eternal Vigilance."
"Show your strength."
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
"Tap into the spirit of the animal."
"Raise a glass to your brave companions!"
"Blade or bow, axe or musket? The journeyman survives, the master flourishes."
"Never reveal your hand until the gold is on the table."
"Darkness shrouds our most lucrative ventures."
"You say so much, when you say nothing at all."
"As if the Corrupted weren't scary enough…"
"A canine so faithful they don't require a physical form to be there for you. Plus, no allergies or shedding!"
"Long lost beneath the desert sands, now free to wreak its havoc.“
"Its kiss giveth life, its sting taketh it away."
"The spark of life descends from the heavens."
"A bite worse than its bark."
"A fearsome beast, now lost to time, donated the bones that form this insidious blade."
"The murky depths shelter remnants of the primordial darkness.“
"Energy currents run through this piece of facial wear, giving the wearer the apperance of being a little more magical than they really are."
"Even though it's made of wood, this mask makes you think of rock…"
"When fear overtakes the land, his services find high demand.“
"The mysterious stranger, hardly glimpsed yet never forgotten.“
"It's easier to hide any spills if you wear red, my friend."
"For a musty relic contained for thousands of years, it doesn't smell as bad as I thought."
"Sinister and sepulchral, armies of bone heed his summons."
"For summoning dogs, companions, or any combination thereof."
"Prostrate thyself before a higher power."
"A flip of the coin."
"A job well done!"
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
"Neither light nor color can escape the deep darkness of its fur. But do you know what can? Love! And this big kitty needs lots of it."
"Strikes with the force of a war horse at full gallop... and also on fire."
"Power corrupts. The Wicked Tyrant gets you that kind of power."
"Show them your allegiance, brandish it as you fight, smack them in the face with it once in a while if need be. Make it known you are a foe to be feared."
"A sword for the brave, the refined, the most gallant of our knights."
"What is true strength? The power to make decisions that govern others? Or simply the force required to kill?"
"None need doubt who their ruler is, lest they feel an icy hand close around their treasonous throat."
"It is wise to shield one's eyes when gazing upon such resplendent glory."
"If the fool can fooleth the fooled, who is then the fool?"
"The king of the dead is still in every way a king."
"The miscreant ne’er-do-well was happily damned and damnably happy. You’d smile too if you fooled the Devil himself!"
"Can spot a breach at 10 paces. Maybe he needs glasses…" Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"Lure legendary fish into submission by wielding a pole that resembles their underwater allies." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"With this axe, you can swear the creak of the tree falling almost sounds like a wave cresting." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"Protect your pick from evil spirits today!" Pickaxe Tool Skin
"Some giant bird washed up on shore, not sure what it is, but its talons were damn sharp." Sickle Tool Skin
"Why does it look...hungry?" Skinning Knife Tool Skin
"It's been strengthened from the many breaches it has closed." Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"It uses magic to bob the hook just a little bit. Fish seem to love it." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"Never made an alloy out of azoth, but sure, I'll give it a try." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"It may not look like it, but magic courses through this tool." Pickaxe Tool Skin
"The soft blue glow makes you feel like you really fit in at a magical forest." Sickle Tool Skin
"I ordered a skinning knife from you, not an assassin's knife." Skinning Knife Tool Skin
"Tough enough to handle even the most dangerous breaches." Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"The extra reinforcements mean you'll never need to worry about your pole snapping." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"A tool ought to be cared for, but make it out of the right stuff and you won't have to for a long time." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"Tough enough to mine anything you need in Aeternum." Pickaxe Tool Skin
"Keeping a sharp edge for a long time makes this sickle extremely practical." Sickle Tool Skin
"Tough enough to tear through even Yeti hide." Skinning Knife Tool Skin
Allows you to transfer this character to another world or region of your choice.
"A display of dominance."
"We don't have all eternity... or wait, do we?"
"Water the earth with your tears."
"The resplendent uniform of Death itself, said to stalk every battlefield in Aeternum cursing the island's resurrections."
"The embroidered garb of those seeking mastery in Aeternum's arcane forces."
"Invested in both song and appearance, the wearer finds they want it that way."
"When your wit is as sharp as your blades, you can take whatever you please in Aeternum."
"Aeternum holds a crown to the head of each traveler, they need only rise to meet it."
"Not even the rugged wilderness of Aeternum can keep a royal from looking their best."
"An arrow notched and released from a bow of superior gold and emeralds wounds egos as well as bodies."
"The adventurer walks up to the corrupted portal and bangs their scepter on the ground, demanding its vanquishing." Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"From under the water this pole looks as bright and as harmless as the sun above. Fish will soon learn otherwise." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"In a flourish of blinding light the forest falls before you." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"Commands rock and ore to crumble alike." Pickaxe Tool Skin
"The shimmer of this tool when used in the wild attracts the eyes of many a jealous adventurer." Sickle Tool Skin
"Doubles as a letter opener for your all your regal missives." Skinning Knife Tool Skin
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
Consumable Dye Pack
"Royal resplendence fit for the noble-born, either living or Corrupted."
"A touch of magic pairs well with any task, including gathering what is needed to survive."
"Strength of arm can be the best way to render the resources of Aeternum into their constituent natures."
"A collection of frightful, cursed tools that bore into the user's very psyche for their power."
"These tools shine so that all may know who wields the power of gold on Aeternum."
"By gleam of gem, finery of fur, and glamour of vivid color, one revels and fights back the chill of the darkest nights of the year."
"In the dead of winter, even the most practical hunter dons their finest colors before seeking the light and warmth of the season’s festival."
"One cuts a distinctive silhouette in the season's gloom as folk gather for celebratory processions."
"These wondrous implements represent a lost technology beyond the sciences of any scholar you know."
"Ancient songs and carols fill the head of this sword’s wielder, and often they sing along during the dance of battle. Wassail! Wassail!"
"Every kill feels like an offering to the chthonic forces waiting just below the surface of the riotously merry holidays."
"Festoon your prey with festive arrows and deck the halls with your trophies."
"This gilded axe glitters and gleams with the glory of the season."
"In the crackle of the forming ice, one can hear the jolly cackle of a dandy demon."
"Carved in winter and hardened over a burning Yule log, the energies of this staff fill one with the warmth of a cozy hearth."
"Gathering resources in the dead of winter can be a grim and gloomy enterprise. Why not warm the heart with glitter and gilt?"
"Draw upon the power of the Void."
"True art is never understood in its own time."
"The cycle of life continues."
"Don the resplendent uniform of Death itself, said to stalk every battlefield in Aeternum. Get some dark gray dye along with it to remove even more light from the world."
"True art is never understood in its time. Style yourself accordingly."
Allows you to transfer this character to another world or region of your choice.
"If I'm this cold already, imagine how cold Forever Winter would be!"
"A traditional dance."
"A big, hearty belly laugh!"
"Welcome guests to your home during Winter Convergence, a time of cheer and fear in Aeternum."
"Complete with its own scarf to keep warm against the threat of Forever Winter."
"Protect yourself from the icy winters of Aeternum in a standing tent."
"Enjoy the view in elegant style with this standing tent."
"Each blow blocked seems to further enrage the animal carved onto the shield, teeth glinting ever-sharper."
"The orb atop this pillar of flame is carved of the finest jade known to Aeternum."
"Feel the might of the generals of old coursing through your veins with each swing."
"From the mouth of a great beast the bullet flies, sinking into its unlucky target."
"Darkness lies within the glint of gold."
"As quick and as loud as a firecracker, this ornamental gun is more than meets the eye."
"Let loose a roar that shakes the foundations of Aeternum."
"The armor seems to sculpt itself against the wearer's body like a second skin for ultimate stealth."
"These tools may help you find fortune in the coming year."
"Bound by the storm that brought you to Aeternum, you have carved out a name for yourself on the island."
"For those unafraid of getting their gloves dirty with the salt of the earth."
"Wave in a royal manner."
"Dost thou even lift, brother?"
"Scribble your autograph. No doubt your fans are desperate for it."
"Angels are in short supply on Aeternum. Make more. Just don't get frostbite."
"Welcome in the new year!"
"A mystical being that has gifted you with its presence and its protection."
"The sign of the tiger."

"A deer with its own scarf to keep warm against the threat of Forever Winter. Plus some dyes to add seasonal color to your outfits."

"A collection of essentials to help you survive in style on Aeternum."
"Weapons engraved with the mystic runes of a fearsome warrior culture."
"When marauders appear on the coast, both good and evil souls tremble in fear."

DisplayName: Angels and Demons Weapon Skin Bundle
Description: "Will you choose weapons imbued with the light of grace, or those extracted from the chaos of the inferno?"

DisplayName: Angels and Demons Apparel Skin Bundle
Description: "On Aeternum, good and evil, the holy and the unholy, wrap around each other like twisted vines."
"Vital gestures understood in all languages."
Get all Runic apparel and weapon skins! Longship and bloodthirst not included.
Get all Angels and Demons apparel and weapon skins! A statement on the duality of the world.
"A selection of weapons fit for the mightiest ruler."
"When among royalty, dress appropriately."
Get all Royal Court apparel, tool, and weapon skins! Whether you rule through benevolence or with an iron fist, your style needs are covered.

DisplayName: Lunar New Year Weapon Skin Bundle
Description: "Mark the new year with a fearsome roar and wicked slash."

DisplayName: Lunar New Year Apparel Skin Bundle
Description: "Honor your resolution to conquer all of your enemies on Aeternum."
Get all Lunar New Year apparel, tool, and weapon skins! May Fortune favor your endeavors in Aeternum this year.
"These arrows find a home in the heart of an enemy and their bruised imprint stays there forevermore."
"The flames of my affection cannot be tamed."
"Not all forms of love require the flames of passion."
"If looks could kill, you wouldn't need this gun."
"Much like an arrow of Cupid, its tip seeks to sink into a heart and endear itself there forever."
"Is that heavy feeling in your body from seeing your beloved, or is it from the hammer they're burying into your chest?"
"Ride upon your trusty steed."
"For those who find themselves lost in frequent bouts of admiration and swooning."
"Upon donning this armor, your chest swells with the urge to protect the innocent, the unguarded, and the lovers of the world."
"Love benefits from great effort… and the accumulation of resources."
"Rising from the dark and twisting sea, a deadly wave crashes ashore."
"And so the mountains rang with the cry of Hallelujah!"
"It feels warm in your hand, pulsing a kind of oppressive heat that almost smells of sulfur."
"To protect from wickedness and champion purity, one must have a proper shield."
"A beacon to slice through the darkness, to lift the spirits of all who see it wielded by a champion of the light."
"A fallen angel makes for a monstrous bearer of sacrifice."
In the dead of winter, even the most practical hunter dons their finest colors before seeking the light and warmth of the season's festival.
In the dead of winter, even the most practical hunter dons their finest colors before seeking the light and warmth of the season's festival.
In the dead of winter, even the most practical hunter dons their finest colors before seeking the light and warmth of the season's festival.
In the dead of winter, even the most practical hunter dons their finest colors before seeking the light and warmth of the season's festival.
In the dead of winter, even the most practical hunter dons their finest colors before seeking the light and warmth of the season's festival.
This wand hums with power and is always cool to the touch, even if put to the flame.
There is something about this fishing rod, a glimmer or reverberation, that tempts fish with a deadly and impossible attraction.
The constantly adjusting balance and counterweight of this axe improves one’s chopping form to rote perfection.
By the perfectly pitched chimes of this striking pick, one can identify the minerals they strike in the dark.
This vibrating blade seems to guide the hand to crops most ready for the reaping.
With barely a thought, this supernal blade parts all matter.
Marks of Fortune Currency Pack
"The breathless euphoria of true and undying love. Literally undying."
"Who would not be wooed by petals so bright and fragrance so sweet?"
A collection of purple flowers that blooms only in winter, signaling the time of Convergence upon Aeternum.
A wreath that welcomes all to the holiday of Winter Convergence, a time of cheer and fear in Aeternum.
Known for blooming flowers even during the harshest winters, hanging a bundle above your doorway is said to foster peace and love to those who walk beneath it.
Consumable Dye Pack
"Furnishings perfect for a romantic evening or for being trapped in a loveless eternity on Aeternum."
For the growth and maintenance of a blossoming botanist. Just add water!
Sharing a tent in Aeternum is among one of the most intimate experiences adventurers can experience, and this one is conveniently large for whatever your idea of a romantic night in is.
Whether your specialty is palm-reading or tarot cards, customers will line up at this tent for your predictions.
Shelter from the cold and rough wilds of Aeternum under the phases of the ever-changing moon.
"Welcome in the new season with the color and freshness of Aeternum's finest flowers."
This hare loves to wear his springtime attire.
"Offer polite greetings."
"Stretch the mind and body with this rejuvenating posture."
"Wow the crowd at your next cotillion with this futuristic dance."
This sting never wastes a drip of precious poison.
Block and press the advantage with both layers of metal adorned with floral filigree.
As each petal unfurls, new secrets of healing are revealed.
The members of the Solanum genus are deadly for their poisons, best distributed through their prickly thorns.
A Petalshot by any other name would kill just as sweetly.
Only the hardiest of flower can survive the icy-cold this gauntlet radiates.
"The veins of plants unknown cling to this armor, pulsing with life."
"Become the ruler of all things verdant and green in this root-wrapped set."
"Bark as thick and heavy as stone rests on the skin of the wearer, granting them superior immunity."
"No wolf dare challenge you or Grandma now."
A bear skin rug so dark it almost looks purple. Perfect for lounging seductively on in your own bare skin.
Phases of the moon wax and wane, but the power of this shield is a splendorous constant.
Put your faith in the ever-moving heavens above and strike forth, chosen one.
Hack and slice with the elegance of the moon shimmering over Lake Guinevere.
Wielded by countless mages before you, the staff is still light and tingling with magic.
Dusk envelopes the western side of Aeternum and quickly sweeps the land as the sun sets for you.
Reveal the destinies of those who would cross you.
"Imbued with the shining powers of the crescent moon, lighting up Aeternum just as the lunar surface does at night."
"Wealth and resources do not guarantee a glorious destiny."
"After a day spent fighting for your life on the island, sit by the campfire and prepare a classic, delicious treat."
"Cool off!"
"Right back at ya!"

DisplayName: Fate and Fortune Housing Décor Bundle
Description: "A thoughtful arrangement of your furnishings can help you form a deeper communion with the spirits roaming Aeternum."
Who is that mysterious swine, and why does it look so dapper? Is it filthy rich?
"The star shines on, bathing Aeternum in the golden light of redemption."
"Let out the rage that burns deep within your heart."
"Made of the finest Mourningdale wool, this tunic and cape shift silently as the ranger prowls the wilds."
"Soar into battle to protect what is rightfully yours."
"Dragons are fine friends to have, and dangerous foes to face."
"The might of a dragon is never to be underestimated."
"Swing with the ferocity of a mythical beast at your back."
"Forever intertwined, these two serpents bare their teeth for their next meal."
"Spitting flames and burning enemies comes as second nature when holding this staff."
"Aim straight and true, for the power of the dragon is with you."
"Dazzle like a diva, showcasing your refined poise and grace."
"We'll settle this the civilized way, with organized pummeling."
"Imagine the many mysteries you could solve with a bit of thoughtful contemplation."
"Trust me, it's all ears."
Even the most avaricious creature could be comfortable inside this spacious tent.
"The perfect attire for exploring primeval forests or abyssal dungeons."
"Weapons that have long slumbered in the lair of a wicked worm, still sharp and ready for battle."
"A harvester's dream come true."
Aeternum may deny eternal rest, but you can still sleep like the dead within this tent.
An assassins' breed of wolf, cultivated for generations to silently keep pace with their owner, carrying spare weapons and poisons. The only downside is their breath is worse than their bite.
"Stalk your enemies with confidence, knowing that when they realize you're there… it's already too late."
"The tools of someone fanatically dedicated to the taking of life."
"Everyone needs companionship on this twisted, cruel island. Invite these four-legged friends into your home."
"Masterly crafted toolsets demonstrate your flair while you do the hard work required to build a fortune."
"Made of the finest studded leather in Aeternum it is equally protective as it is silent in movement."
"What looks at first to be a large bird running at you will be your untimely demise."
"Your worst nightmare come alive to haunt the battlefields of Aeternum."
Two edges are deadlier than one.
To slice, dice, and chop your victim to bits.
Ripped from a wrought iron fence in Brightwood and used instead to kill.
Suddenly all is dark and cold, opponent felled by an icicle to the back.
Without a second thought you summon forth your void blade and pierce enemy skin.
Shots fired from the braided barrel guarantee a swift, almost merciful death before resurrection drags the soul back.
"For those in the dark trades, even resource gathering is done in the black of night."
"A hoard within the home, reminders of a glorious life of adventuring."
"Absolutely nothing whatsoever is even remotely ok."
"A skillful and sultry set of movements."
"The judge looks for the shoulders pinned to the ground, then ratifies the indisputable dominance of the challenger."
"Be deeply suspicious of one plotting with clearly evil intent."
"Is some new possession spreading through Aeternum? One that produces these strange, mechanical movements?"
"For when the spirit of the music consumes one completely."
"Fire dance with me."
"Pull for all you're worth! Pull like you're back at sea, hauling the mainsail aloft."
"Hit them with your best shot."\n\nThis emote does a small amount of damage.
"Because you're not hardcore unless you live hardcore."
"Be the diehard hero of the Medleyfaire with this intimidating style."
"Proof you've outsmarted the devil himself in a fiddle play-off."
The stud eyes of the skull emblazoned on the front burn with fiery vengeance.
Slash your way through the naysayers of your musical talents.
Wail and shred on your enemies with this guitar-inspired ax.
For setting stages and crowds ablaze.
There is no metal heavier than this.
Is that the low, discordant note of a bass or a blast of shrapnel in your enemy's side?
"For those who find the harshest melodies in the simplest of tasks."
Ribbed in metal, this flute plays a tune that'll get the whole room dancing.
Let the chains rattle with the force of your drumsticks.
Tear through the crowds with your sound, and let your presence be known.
Covered in silver trim boning, this large instrument can be heard for miles.
Once this mandolin starts playing the urge to dance oneself to death becomes irresistible.
"Know that if you come knocking, this house will be rocking."
Surprise your guests with this fake fish feast. You'll have everyone hootin' and hollerin' to the music as this azoth-fueled novelty bass dances in the air.
Rest easy knowing the spikes outside will intimidate most enemies away on sight.
This hardcore hut can withstand even the mightiest bear attacks with its metal framing.
"Test your metal."
"Heavy lies the head that tunes down."
"Commence with the stabbing!"
"Make your closing remarks clear, then depart."
"Drink to the health to your fine companions."
"While a phoenix may rise from the ashes, we don't recommend burning down your house to test the phenomenon."
"As it is said, they flock together."
"As the pyre burns higher, so too does your spirit of battle within."
"Outshine, outwit, and bring your opponents to their knees."
Strike true to send your enemies careening back to the unforgiving earth of Aeternum.
Bring down what none thought could be grounded.
Each strike is elevated with the beauty of your weapon.
It's imbued with magic to weigh more when striking a foe.
Let your healing lift your team to the heights of the heavens.
Rise from the ashes to shoot down your foes.
"Airily light, to make it easy to lift your fortunes."
Call down the power of the sun itself to brighten your performance.
Play with the power of the waning moon behind your notes.
It takes a strong palm to play this instrument, one you can spot from several meters away in another musician.
A creation of stained-glass that shows a phoenix wreathed in flames. Beautiful for decorating your home. Terrible for privacy while changing.
A golden fire pit in the shape of a phoenix rising in glory. Perfect to gather round with friends for both light and warmth.
A lovely and very hot arrangement of phoenix feathers aflame in a stylish vase. Careful not to place it near anything flammable.

DisplayName: Hear No Evil, See no Evil, Speak No Evil
Description: "Just generally avoid all engagement with evil."
"When setting out for revenge, dig one grave. It's all you'll need."
"When your rage boils over, the table pays the price."\n\nThis emote does a small amount of damage.
"View to verify you are indeed the most beautiful of all."
"Bestow the honor and obligation of knighthood."
"Tap tap tap tap tap tap tap."
"You may not have much, but you have this walk."
A mythical bird of death and rebirth. Its glorious plumage emits heat and fire, but it will not burn the ones it trusts if they were to pet it.
Relax in repose with a tent that springs forth from the ashes of Aeternum.
Wield the might of the jackal, blade biting and honed for combat.
Block incoming blows with the enigmatic scarab of the desert's hard shell.
Use to free souls from their mortal coil.
The scarab holds a pearl aloft charged with the powers of life itself.
The long-lost gauntlet of a long-forgotten ruler of the sands.
Two scarabs reach out their crawlers to guide and empower the arrows shot forth.
With the insight of the God of Power all secrets of the sands can be revealed.
Imbued with the might of the lion goddess, there is no enemy you cannot overcome.
Carved in onyx, this armor teems with the power of the chief embalmer.
Signal to all who dare turn their gaze upon you that you are indeed the ruler of the desert.
"Uncover ancient mysteries with these magnificent relics."
Summon the power of pantheons of old through the beating of your drums.
Strum to affect all those in earshot with the urge to dance and revel in the sands.
A Mandolin for the sleepy sunsets in Brimstone Sands, with compatriots gathered around a fire to rest their weary battle arms.
With only your eyes exposed to the elements, look upon the dunes of sand and chart your course to victory.
Rise up with the might of the desert wind and unleash forces of an ancient evil. This bundle also includes the "Desert Vanguard" title.
Some treasures should remain buried beneath the desert sands.
A regal hawk stands ready to guard whatever you may wish to store in here. Typically, it's organs.
Some people tend to mix up the Ancients and the Egyptians. And while they have some similarities, they were very different in a multitude of ways.
A place for both scarabs and adventurers to find reprieve from the oppressive heat of Aeternum's deserts.
This pyramid-like structure sports a chimney for warmth and if the cycle of death and rebirth is interrupted, it may just be your last night by the fire.
A functional piece of art that may or may not still be full of its haunted contents, treasure, or both.
When you stare into the gem, evil stares back.
Do you curse your foes or simply crush them with your might? Does it matter as long as they flee from your presence?
First to explore the mysterious deserts of Aeternum.
The standard-bearing soldier of the Roman army marches with purpose and pride.
Complete with outstretched arms and a Corrupted skull, this tent offers reprieve from the horrors of Aeternum.
Wrap yourself in a comforting cocoon of spider silk this Nightveil Hallow.
Ancient relics that demonstrate your glorious power, whether in life or in your tomb after death.
This face of an aquatic assailant will haunt your dreams.
A direct response of a mask artist being made fun of for wearing glasses.
Two sets of sharp teeth are better than one.
Swirled skin runs in a spiral with teeth emerging on all sides.
Wrapped and sealed tight for comfort and protection. Just try not to get blood in the eye stitches.
Bare your sharpest of fangs to rip through armor and flesh.
Protect yourself from the horrors of Aeternum with your stalwart combatant's spirit and this armor fit for a true warrior.
The red fabric resembles sinewy muscle tissue, all exposed for the battle.
Gnashing teeth and twirling tongues reflect in shining silver.
The gaze locks upon you and you can hear the roar of the ocean coming to devour you.
When the end comes for us all, the only survivors will be the crotchety cockroaches.
For carving up festive pumpkins or bothersome enemies.
The expanded consciousness of this wolf-like creature is yours to wield in protection of your allies.
For the torturing of eternal souls lucky or unlucky enough to escape Aeternum's moratorium on death.
Not the most precise tool for surgery, but it gets the job done.
Some things just need to be set on fire.
Whatever you do, don't anything in the hole you aren't willing to live without.
This eye sees a cold hellscape, a Forever Winter realized.
The gnarled hand of an old sorcerer holds an orb of immense power that you can feel in the kick.
Etched with the carvings of carnage, this sword is no stranger to the battlefield.
Ancient horrors can help reap new nightmares.
Leave your enemies wondering if they're trapped in a horrible dream as you approach them on the battlefield.
Sleep tight. No need to dream of your worst fears.
A very friendly and well-trained spider companion. It knows many tricks and is happy to perform them, as long as it remains well fed.
Clothe yourself in the darkness of ancient memories.
Weapons that will lodge themselves in the nightmares, and flesh, of your foes.
Costumes sure to cause a stir at the party, and make partygoers draw their blades in fear at your arrival.
Conjure the most primordial fears in those who oppose you.
Terrify the armies foolish enough to rise against you.
Satin and opalescent inlays shimmer under the moonlight in the woods, seeking foolish mortals.
Protective layers fit for a Fairy King.
Shining with the power of moonlight, take your rightful place as ruler of the night.
Ever seen a dusk spirit with a gun? Now you have.
With one prick on the finger, this blade can put the innocent right to sleep.
The massive gem in the center of this hatchet was acquired from the hunt after a raucous game of charades.
It's been said that winged creatures make satisfying crunch when smacked out of the air.
Magical fire pours forth from this staff, heavy with purpose in an adventurer's hand.
With a snap of your fingers, sugarplum spirits scatter in fear.
Entrance and enthrall all with your lilting melodies.
Play as lightly and sprightly as a sylph theirself.
For the mischievous musician who wishes to play in sultry, dulcet tones.
Turn that frown upside-down!
Let the festivities begin!
Give your love a rose, thorns first.
Everything you need to leave a trail of bodies in your wake.
Go out in a blaze of glory, or up in smoke.
Show off your amazing dance moves!
They may not know your name, but they will know you by your deeds.
Your fine guests will feel right at home in these lavish and enchanted furnishings.
Nobles and monst'rs alike may conv'rge and conv'rse amongst the spirits and magics of a dusk spirit's pavillion.
Thyne e'rie lant'rns attracteth flutt'ring spirits, and can draweth one's attention f'r most wondrous lengths, until rest and dreams ov'rtake thee.
With gifts guarded by a brave snowman, let the wilds of Aeternum and anyone who passes by know––Convergence is here to stay!
This snowy furred feline is purrfectly happy loafing by the fire, or chilling in the snow. In either case, they adore pets from you.
Something warm and comforting to cling to when the winter winds blow and nightmare-ish creatures howl.
The mystical spirits that guard the land that have imbued this toolset with their knowledge of how to best harvest its resources.
Sound the call. We go to war!
Show your love to your sweetheart, friends and even your adoring fans.
What is a zombie in a land of eternal life? Just take a look at The Lost.
A formal sign of respect.
Things aren't going your way. Show it.
Rock on!
Skip merrily through this dreadfully evil and dangerous land.
Best to walk as quietly as you can. There are truly deadly creatures around that possess excellent hearing.
Courtesy counts for a lot in this world. Not as much as skill with a great axe and a band of murderous friends, but still a lot.
Click them heels and see if you can escape this cursed island.
A skill perfect for dazzling others and absolutely useless during game time.
You've done it! Against all odds! Goal!
Recall me ever more, let my name never slip from the annals of your glorious history for always was I faithful to…
You can feel the uncanny warmth of winter within you.
Celebrants have used such clothing during the Convergence for many centuries.
Their true purpose has been forgotten for centuries, but such ceremonial knights guard us during our celebrations.

DisplayName: Great Axe of the Great Elk
Description: It was forged with powerful metals, but the soul of a great winter beast still lives on within it.
It is traditionally given to youngsters on their 5th Convergence. It may be dangerous, but that will be an important lesson.
It was previously used in ceremonies to welcome the coming of Winter. Its report would begin the celebrations.
A gift given to young warriors in the hopes that they will grow into it in the years to come.
Starting fires for warmth becomes much harder in the winter. This glorified tinderbox should serve you quite well in the cold.
A beautiful piece of art for any mantle. It serves a dual purpose as a fun sled.
The cold of the void fits in perfectly with the growing winter.
Snowball fights are a popular sport for Yetis in the winter.
A Greatsword forged from a fallen star. It traveled for millenia through the inky- oh wait no, that's just Gleamite.
Not one, not two, but three pairs of warm and comfy footwear to keep your toes warm this winter holiday.
Coats are a must in the freezing winter season, and so is a coat rack to hang them up and dry off for the next snowy excursion.
Hot drinks are a must when the weather gets cold, and decadent chocolate and cream, cinnamon and spices, makes them even better.
A classic children's toy, adorned with bells that jingle so sweetly when you give this horse a gentle push.
Don't hold back. Your honor is on the line.
Toss glittering gleamites.
What’s worse than corruption? Congestion.
Show your holiday spirit and love of tradition.
While Aeternum is rife with corrupted souls, one can also find delicate and enchanting magic among its many spirits.
The results are both unpredictable and enchanting when using weapons blessed by the spirits of the wild.
A slot for holding a Gear Set for the activity of your choosing. A maximum of seven slots can be purchased, for a total of nine slots.\nGear Sets are not available for use until level 25.
Stave off forever winter in festive spirit with these seasonal outfits!
Winter Convergence is a wonderful time to celebrate with family and draw deadly weapons over the slightest insult!
Washed ashore from the Eastern Sea, this armor was neither dampened nor sullied by the tides that beseeched it.
"Where the Rainbow ends, the Dragon begins."
It is said that when the Dragon King descends from the Heavens, the dawn upon his back casts as radiant wings.
"His teeth, like icicles at the mouth of a cave, parted and unleashed a fowl blizzard that raged for thirty days and nights."
Legend tells of a young dragon whose greed was so great that he enveloped an unknown treasure with his own ice and body, only to be frozen solid along with it.
On a particularly cold day, the trail of its shot may linger as a cloud, like a single thread through the silken sky.
"And as the enemy breached, the brothers' blasted such a flurry of snow that it formed a towering wall over the kingdom and guarded it forevermore."
Decorate your home with these treasure before settling into your winter hibernation.
Which is colder? The icy heart of winter or the frosty heart of the dragon?
Cleave your way through the deepest of winter snow.
Increase a character's yield by 10% for 90 minutes of game time while Logging, Mining, Harvesting, and Skinning.\n\nUsage is paused during Outpost Rush.
Increase a character's Weapon experience earned by 100% for 2 hours of game time.
Increase a character's Territory Standing earned by 100% for 2 hours of game time.
Increase a character's passive Season experience generation by 100% for 2 hours of game time.
Increase a character's Logging, Mining, Harvesting, and Skinning experience earned by 100% for 2 hours of game time. Does not apply for Aptitude levels.
The foul weather of Spring's first stirs and when the Cailleach awakens, winter shall have passed.
The prowling lynx emerges from her den, eager for a spring feast.
May her wisdom guide you.
May her grace restore you.
May her strength be yours.
May her teachings aid you.
Spread the love.
Wow onlookers with your uncanny mastery of fire.
Let loose and dance like everyone's watching.
Cast a line and see who you'll catch.
Which omen will appear? That of a mild winter or that of a treacherous, frigid nightmare?
They say delusion is the only way to feel warmth once the frozen pall of winter arrives.
The herald of winter is death.
Cauterize the wound as you cut.
As heavy as an anvil; as hot as the forge.
It’s said that on a stormy night, its light can shine brighter and further than any lighthouse.
Be wary of the forking fire.
The thick leather protects you from its immense ambient heat, but not everyone else.
“Alright, fine. You lead.”
A faint light embers on its surface.
A faint light embers on its surface.
“From the ashes he rose and within his heart burned a smoldering twilight.”
Stoke the flame. Ever burn.
“See how the shadows flicker? Like skulking assassins.”
From the ashen depths burns the vigilant gaze of the Warden.
Hard effort in the heat of the fire yields infernal rewards.
Illuminate the night from within this cozy yurt capable of repelling even the harshest Aeternum winds.
Light shines in from all directions, filling its space with an inviting glow.
Bask in the cozy warmth of the flames.
Fashion that in and of itself is a sick burn.
Forged in fire, quenched in flame, these weapons burn hotter than the rage within your heart.

You're the champ! The underdog claims the crown!
You gave it your best shot!
Somewhere out in the burning sands is a rolling storm of crackling lightning and this drum carries its growl.
Strumming this guitar is like rekindling with an old friend; every note is warm and comforting.
The belly of this bass echoes like a lonely flame burning deep in the quiet earth.

This gilded grating creates a shrine of the fire that brings warmth to the home.
A fixed lamp that casts shadows similar to swaying acrobats.
The fibers of this rug are particularly warm, like if it had soaked in all the warmth of the setting sun.
This shadowbox pulls you in, as if inviting you into the heart of Brimstone.
A standing lantern that brightens the room as if filled with vibrant performers.
A table-side lamp that houses what appear to be small, writhing dancers.

When adorned in glittering riches from head to toe, does it truly matter from whence it came? After all, they’re mine now.\n\nIncludes three head skin variants!
A strain between integrity and indecency, feasting upon the living like parasites and the dead like fungi. Such is the nature of a scoundrel.
Creaking and scrapping, as if rust from bone; arise.
Proof that the gentry don't have a monopoly on fencing.
Whether or not this shield has seen better days is really a matter of perspective.
The sharp, serrated teeth were a nice touch to an otherwise verily lethal hatchet.
What is of more value than the most dangerous game?
Some might call the cold a mercy, though it's debatable.
Don't let its worn appearance fool you - it has a nasty kick.
A walk suitable for traveling between the tavern and your house, if you can remember where it is.
The dance craze that is sweeping across Aeternum!
Ha ha!
Will you throw in  your lot with the highwaymen and scoundrels who roam Aeternum?
Weapons suitable for mercenaries, brigands and other dangerous wanderers of the land.
Even amid the horrors of Aeternum, one can find still find verdant green sanctuaries, but the Angry Earth is always near at hand.
Clad yourself in menacing armor and be ready to annihilate your foes.
The heralding hero, clad in silver, proudly bears the charge of the people's kingdom.
The infamous Black Dragon is as powerful as it is fearsome.
Knights of gold have no fear and march on to wherever order is in need.
Emerge triumphant from the field of battle, your garden of ivory bone.
The gothic design harkens back to antiquity, to a time of galantry and bloodshed.
The formidable design harkens back to antiquity, to a time of bravery and battle.
The elegant design harkens back to antiquity, to a time of passion and fire.
The weighty design harkens back to antiquity, to a time of loyalty and siege.
The commanding design harkens back to antiquity, to a time of chivalry and sovereignty.
The venerable design harkens back to antiquity, to a time of honor and glory.

Steel from centuries past, if well maintained, is just as deadly as any crafted today.
When you're feeling it, bust out the arm wave dance.
Strut your stuff!

For a job well done.
Die. Hard.
Let's connect.

This anvil will come in tremendously handy if you have a hammer.
Show your allegiance! To something.
Books are for mages. Which… you probably are.
There's no tree you won't chop down to size.
You've got great loot. Keep it close. And highly visible.
The cook is always popular. Unless they're a terrible chef. Then, they're usually killed.
It looks amazing. Hopefully, it won't open a portal and let even more horrid creatures on to Aeternum.
Quite a catch! May your mount speed you to a settlement before it begins to smell!
For those who've taken a keen interest in plants of all kinds.
Loyal as a hound, proud as a lion, and fast as the wind.
Imposing iron barding conceals a will as hard as steel.
A nomad's soul. No home but the road ahead.
Quick as the North wind, as ashen as fresh fallen snow.
Dark as midnight, and as fast as a falling star.
A flaxen-maned beauty with the heart of a racer.
Your bond with this canine cements your place as leader of the pack.
The claws of a natural hunter, matched with the steel of a knight on the warpath.
A wolf without a pack is like a ghost in the fog.
Fangs like fresh ice, and a coat like the snow on the mountaintops.
Some say the wolves of twilight are an ill omen. But yours is loyal as the dawn.
Gray as smoke with fire in its eyes.
An apex predator, and your friend through all troubles.
Quiet as a cat and as solid as iron.
A solitary hunter. The greatest threats are often those unseen.
It is said that the white lion is the messenger of a higher power.
Black lions herald the ending of one age, and the start of the next.
A rare breed, this majestic beast comes to the aid of those whose hearts remain wild.
The sea's depths crush all, and so too shall you.
The sea stops for no one, and neither shall you.
The sea's waters offer life, and so too shall you.
The sea strikes without warning, and so too shall you.
The sea knows no fear, and neither shall you.
The sea shows no mercy, and neither shall you.
Untold horrors stalk the vast reaches of the sea. First among them: you.
Swiftly stalk the shore, safely swathed in shell, spine, and scale.
The abyssal depths have taught you well - that which can't kill you only makes you stronger.
Woe is me.
Fill the air with shimmering bubbles.
No one's sure if all Vikings walk like this, but at least one did.
Drink deep of the wine-dark sea, and embrace the power held within.
Long have you known fathoms below contain unspeakable wonders - and now, they rest in your palms.

Will you fight to maintain the balance of chaos and order on Aeternum?
The balance between light and shadow can easily shift here on Aeternum.
Without harmony, there is only discord.
The wit of the Jester can be deadly. Give him a blade and soon you may not be laughing at all.
Chaos and order, day and night, all has its place in the order of the world.
Expertly maintaining the balance between darkness and light.
Symmetry and balance in all things - this is our oath.

Cloaked in Nature's fury, set forth to explore the untamed wild.
The elegant beauty and raw power of nature, all in the palm of your hand.
Unfailing protection in a surprisingly elegant package.
Let vine and branch inspire and heal.
Don't let the elegant design fool you - it packs quite a punch.
Graceful lines and precious gold form the fanciest pointy stick this side of Oxboro.
Lethal beauty in the palm of your hand, and the flanks of your foes.
Whatever you do, make sure you're not the one it stings.
Stalk the wilds like a wraith, passing like a whisper through arbor and vine.

For those times when you ARE the hype.

No crow fears what is only known in whispers as the Hay Man, for it is equally enmeshed in death as they are.
One can only hope to never see a floating vessel in Aeternum, for it would surely be Charon's and this would surely be the Underworld.
A soulless puppet. A blind servant. The perfect companion. The peril of her maker.
Unyielding to even death. May they rest in peace.
Titans in life and beyond. May they rest in peace.
Only truer than their aim was their love. May they rest in peace.
Always wanted to go out with a 'bang'. May they rest in peace.
Their flame burns eternal and ever bright. May they rest in peace.
Once and always a defender from evil. May they rest in peace.
Many enter with visions of fortune. Few leave, transformed into little more than bone and dust.
When the moon looms above and the veil wears thin, they prowl and creak among the shadows.
Legends long past lend power in death, as they did in life.

For those who feel the threads of magic interwoven with their very being.

Once bound by oath, but still empowered by principle.
